name: Arduino
description: Arduino is a software and hardware platform, which is built on simple I/O interface version of open source. The hardware part is the Arduino circuit board for circuit connection. The program code is written in the software platform IDE, and the programs are uploaded to the Arduino circuit board and executed.

en_US.description: Arduino is a software and hardware platform, which is built on simple I/O interface version of open source. The hardware part is the Arduino circuit board for circuit connection. The program code is written in the software platform IDE, and the programs are uploaded to the Arduino circuit board and executed.
en_US.name: Arduino

zh_CN.description: Arduino是一个软硬件平台，构建于开放原始码simpleI/O介面版，硬件部分是可以用来做电路连接的Arduino电路板，在软件平台IDE中编写程序代码，将程序上传到Arduino电路板并执行。
zh_CN.name: Arduino
